properties.description: Chip Abele's GCF Development completed the 25-story, 386-unit tower at 1776 Polk Street in Hollywood in 2019, and earlier this year announced plans to convert Circ Residences into condos.

properties.description: PMG changed course with its Society Biscayne apartment tower in dowtown Miami about two years ago, when it was nearly completed. The developer converted the project into The Elser Hotel & Residences, a 49-story, 646-unit building at 398 Northeast Fifth Street.
